title: Nuoc Cham (dipping sauce or dressing)
ingredients:
6 tbspn water

2 tbspn sugar
2 tbspn fish sauce
2 tbspn fresh lime or lemon juice
1 clove garlic crushed
1 fresh red chilli (deseeded and finely chopped).
method: You can also add some chopped lemon grass (just the pale end).
This is a great dressing to sprinkle on any salad - adds a zip and a tang.
